attributes.action: Make smoking Illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this e-petition to make smoking illegal in the UK. Everybody knows smoking kills and it costs the NHS millions every year. How can companies legally sell a hazardous product with governments consent??

Real Quotes From Tobacco Companies -

“[T]he amount of evidence accumulated to indict [accuse] cigarette smoke as a health hazard is overwhelming. The evidence challenging such an indictment is scant.” - 1962 RJR memo

Cigarettes “cause or predispose, lung cancer...They contribute to certain cardiovascular disorders...They may well be truly causative in emphysema, etc., etc.” - 1963, president of Council for Tobacco Research.

We cant let this go on.MAKE SMOKING ILLEGAL IN THE UK???
